p: The DPPH radical scavenging ability of EDS oil was tested according to the method described by Xu et al. [ 37] 2 mL, 0.2 mM methanolic DPPH solution was mixed with EDS oil that diluted in isopropanol. The reaction was kept for 30 min in the dark and measured the absorbance at 515 nm on a spectrophotometer. The inhibition percentage of DPPH was calculated as the following formula: % DPPH radical inhibition ratio = (A C − A S)/A C × 100% (2) where A C represents the absorbance value of control sample, and A S represented the absorbance value of oil sample.
